Description: Contains data on groundwater levels from 2015 to 2022, including measurements for pre-monsoon and post-monsoon periods, well details, and location information such as state, district, block, village, and site.
Records data on various contaminants in water sources at the village level, including pH, TDS, turbidity, and various chemical and bacteriological parameters.

Includes water quality data for groundwater monitoring locations, with parameters such as pH, conductivity, BOD, nitrate, and coliform levels. The data includes some unnamed columns that may require further investigation.
Provides an overview of water quality testing results, including the number of sources tested, sources found to be safe or contaminated, and the remedial measures taken.
